thread.title: BRIEF-Vipshop Sees Q1 2018 Revenue RMB 19.1 Bln To RMB 19.9 Bln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Vipshop Sees Q1 2018 Revenue RMB 19.1 Bln To RMB 19.9 Bln
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Vipshop Holdings Ltd:
* VIPSHOP REPORTS UNAUDITED FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 27.1 PERCENT TO RMB 24.1 BILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE RMB 19.1 BILLION TO RMB 19.9 BILLION
* QTRLY DILUTED NET EARNINGS PER ADS $0.17 * QTRLY NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO VIPSHOPâ€˜S SHAREHOLDERS DILUTED $0.83
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW CNY 1.29, REVENUE VIEW CNY 23.28 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW CNY 19.42 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
